overview: Tim Smith is a respected semiconductor-industry figure who has managed, negotiated and delivered numerous high-value, multi-year, multi-national, collaborative business engagements yielding revenues of more than $500 million. Previously, he held VP of WW Field Operations positions at both Silistix and CoWare. Tim has also successfully launched new companies and products as VP of Sales at both Sonics and Triscend. Prior to these executive positions, he was Managing Director of Memec Design Services. Tim holds a BSEE degree from Arizona State University in Tempe Arizona.
